name: CITY OF ATLANTIS
sampleDescriptions: Safety/Noise Impacts on Communities Adjacent to Lantana Airport
Safety/Noise Impacts on Communities Adjacent to Lantana Airport
Working with Congressional delegation to contact FAA about banning jets at Lantana Airport
Lantana Airport and FAA to prohibit jet traffic at small airport
Working to reduce or remove Jet traffic at small Lantana Airport involving FAA and Palm Beach County Department of Airports
